column5: just want to say thanks again to a guide who did a great job for us on quinte.caught my best eye to date. fishing with YOU & ME charters was top drawer thanks Lloyd .
Was great having you and hope we get to do it again. To date that was the hardest day of fishing i have had in a very long time on the bay.
Safe to assume it was this weekend?? man was the fishing tough..  G
Hey Waterwolf,  if you like Quinte you should go out with Lloyd for Chinooks and Bows. Your arms will be tired for a few days after.  Geoff

Yes, have never seen the fish so turned off!!! They must have known the OFC boys and girls were on the hunt for a trophy. The eyes figured they would stay safe by having lock jaw but some had a hard time doing that, they just had to open ther mouth and see what we all look like lol
Phew!!!  Glad to hear this....well...it sucks we didn't get many fish, but if you noticed the same thing then I don't feel quite so bad...LOL.
Do you have any pics of your PB we would love to see!!!

Great yaking with ya Lloyd on the radio and I told you Waterwolf ! If Lloyd can't put 'em in the boat...it just ain't the day! According to Moon Phases etc...it was the worst week to be fishing for the entire year. They were finally starting to show full hooks on the finder... for moving/feeding fish.... late yesterday...and a bit today before Dan and I left the water at 2:15. Those fish that were stacked out on the reach over the weekend where dispersed today...still not biting though.
